description: An HTML file for a Database Viewer frontend, providing an interface to browse databases and their tables with dynamic loading.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refresh the list of databases and update the view.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Load databases from the backend and display them in the sidebar.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggle the visibility of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Load and display tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Load data from a selected table and update the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Render the data in a table format in the content area.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expand/collapse the view of a table cell's content.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Display a loading message in the provided element.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Display an error message in the provided element.

methods.name: showEmptyState
methods.description: Display a message when no data is available.

methods.name: setActiveState
methods.description: Set the active state for a database or table item.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetch data from a given URL and return the parsed JSON response.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Render a single cell for the data table with appropriate formatting.
